message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $175.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $220. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $190.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $200. Can you go any higher than that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $195.
I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob. I'm willing to make one more push, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm thinking $210 is a fair price. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I am willing to pay $205 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm thinking $220 is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Can you go any higher?
Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $215 for it.
